doc:
Maude Allen https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Maude_Allen 0 For the controversial Canadian dancer see Maud Allan.Maude Allen (November 30, 1887 – April 24, 1960) was an American character actress. She was born in Middleborough, Massachusetts. Died in Los Angeles, California, aged 72. She appeared in several Hollywood films in the 1930s and 1940s, including small roles in Show Boat (1936), San Francisco (1936), and as "Dutchess" in the serial The Adventures of Red Ryder (1940). For the_controversial_Canadian_dancer see Maud_Allan.Maude_Allen ( November_30_,_1887 – April_24 , 1960 ) was an_American_character_actress . She was_born in Middleborough , Massachusetts . Died in Los_Angeles , California , aged_72 . She appeared in several_Hollywood_films in the_1930s_and_1940s , including small_roles in Show_Boat_(_1936_) , San_Francisco_(_1936_) , and as " Dutchess " in the_serial The_Adventures of Red_Ryder_(_1940_) .
